48class Surface : public Object {
49 VICUS_READWRITE_PRIVATE
50public:
52 const char * typeinfo() const override { return "Surface"; }
53
54 // *** PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS ***
55

58

63

66
68 void setPolygon3D(const IBKMK::Polygon3D & polygon3D);
69

78

81
86 void flip();
87

89

95
99 QColor m_displayColor; // XML:A
100
101 // *** Runtime Variables ***
102

109
110
116 ComponentInstance *m_componentInstance = nullptr;
